ns0:project.ns0:name: YAWL Parent
ns0:project.ns0:description: Parent POM for YAWL - Yet Another Workflow Language multi-module build

ns0:requirePluginVersions.ns0:message: All plugins must have an explicit version.

ns0:requireReleaseDeps.ns0:message: Release builds must not contain SNAPSHOT dependencies.

ns0:banDependencyVersionRanges.ns0:message: Version ranges are not allowed - use explicit versions.

ns0:target.ns0:echo: Heap dump available in target/heap-dump.hprof (if OOM occurred)
